snippet: The ruling by an Athens court upheld an appeal filed by the shareholders in a bank that the oligarch, Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, once controlled.
abstract: Greek court orders seizure of assets belonging to Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, oligarch whom authorities have charged with fraud and embezzlement, and 29 of his former associates; it is latest legal maneuver in case that has underscored concerns over corruption and crony capitalism.
lead_paragraph: The ruling by an Athens court upheld an appeal filed by the shareholders in a bank that the oligarch, Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, once controlled.

headline.seo: Greek Court Seizes Assets of Lavrentis Lavrentiadis
headline.main: Court Seizes Assets of Greek Oligarch
